concept.title: 3036.104-90 Authority for one-step turn-key design-build contracting for the United States Coast Guard (USCG).

conbody.p: The Head of the Contracting Activity (HCA) of the U.S. Coast Guard may use one-step turn-key selection procedures to enter into fixed-price design-build contracts in accordance with 14 U.S.C. 677.
